00029 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00030 
00038 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00039 //hashlib++ includes
00040 #include "hl_sha512wrapper.h"
00041 
00042 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00043 //STL includes
00044 #include <string>
00045 
00046 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00047 //private memberfunctions
00048 
00055 std::string sha512wrapper::hashIt(void)
00056 {
00057         sha2_byte buff[SHA512_DIGEST_STRING_LENGTH];
00058         sha512->SHA512_End(&context,(char*)buff);
00059         return convToString(buff);
00060 }
00061 
00070 std::string sha512wrapper::convToString(unsigned char *data)
00071 {
00072         /*
00073          * we can just copy data to a string, because 
00074          * the transforming to hash is already done
00075          * within the sha512 implementation
00076          */
00077         return std::string((const char*)data);
00078 }
00079 
00087 void sha512wrapper::updateContext(unsigned char *data, unsigned int len)
00088 {
00089         this->sha512->SHA512_Update(&context,data,len);
00090 }
00091 
00096 void sha512wrapper::resetContext(void)
00097 {
00098         sha512->SHA512_Init(&context);
00099 }
00100 
00101 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00102 //public memberfunctions
00103 
00107 sha512wrapper::sha512wrapper()
00108 {
00109         this->sha512 = new SHA2ext();
00110 }
00111 
00115 sha512wrapper::~sha512wrapper()
00116 {
00117         delete sha512;
00118 }
